meanings.definition: The upper part of the head or skull.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her sincipita to feel the bump.
meanings.sent2: The hat protected his sincipita from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The sincipita seemed to have a mind of its own, always attracting attention.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts seemed to originate from her sincipita, guiding her actions.
meanings.sent5: The sincipita, like a crown, held the essence of her intelligence.

meanings.definition: The front part of the head or skull.
meanings.sent1: His sincipita bore the mark of the accident.
meanings.sent2: The child's bangs covered her sincipita.
meanings.sent3: The sincipita gleamed in the sunlight, almost like a beacon.
meanings.sent4: His sincipita led the way, always facing challenges head-on.
meanings.sent5: The sincipita, like a shield, protected his thoughts from harm.
